surf.english: He bought a new surfboard last week.
surf.spanish: Compró una tabla de surf nueva la semana pasada.

surf.english: She loves surfing early in the morning.
surf.spanish: A ella le encanta surfear temprano en la mañana.

surf.english: The water is warm and the sea is calm.
surf.spanish: El agua está tibia y el mar está tranquilo.
Él practica remar todos los días.

surf.english: If the wind changes, the waves will break differently.
surf.spanish: Si el viento cambia, las olas romperán de manera diferente.

surf.english: She waxed her board before entering the water.
surf.spanish: Ella enceró su tabla antes de entrar al agua.

surf.english: The surf instructor taught him how to duck dive.
surf.spanish: El instructor de surf le enseñó a hacer un 'duck dive'.

surf.english: They checked the tide before going surfing.
surf.spanish: Ellos revisaron la marea antes de ir a surfear.

surf.english: He prefers reef breaks over beach breaks.
surf.spanish: Prefiere las olas de arrecife a las de playa.

surf.english: Despite the strong current, he paddled out successfully.
surf.spanish: A pesar de la fuerte corriente, remó hacia afuera con éxito.

surf.english: If he had chosen a larger board, he could have caught more waves.
surf.spanish: Si hubiera elegido una tabla más grande, podría haber atrapado más olas.

surf.english: After hours in the water, the sunset painted the ocean orange.
surf.spanish: Después de horas en el agua, el atardecer pintó el océano de color naranja.

surf.english: The surfers waited patiently for the perfect set to roll in.
surf.spanish: Los surfistas esperaron pacientemente a que llegara el set perfecto.

surf.english: She injured her shoulder while attempting a new maneuver.
surf.spanish: Se lesionó el hombro al intentar una nueva maniobra.

football.english: He kicked the ball into the goal.

football.spanish: El partido empieza a las 4 p.m.

football.english: They wore red and white uniforms.
football.spanish: Ellos usaron uniformes rojos y blancos.

football.english: He passed the ball to his teammate.
football.spanish: Pasó la pelota a su compañero.

football.english: The goalkeeper saved an incredible shot.
football.spanish: El arquero atajó un tiro increíble.

football.english: They played better in the second half.
football.spanish: Jugaron mejor en el segundo tiempo.

football.english: The coach decided to make three substitutions.
football.spanish: El entrenador decidió hacer tres sustituciones.

football.english: He was fouled near the penalty area.
football.spanish: Fue derribado cerca del área penal.

football.english: The team celebrated after scoring the winning goal.
football.spanish: El equipo celebró después de marcar el gol de la victoria.

football.english: Even though they lost, the fans cheered loudly.
football.spanish: Aunque perdieron, los fanáticos alentaron con fuerza.

football.english: He would have scored if the defender hadn’t blocked the shot.
football.spanish: Habría marcado si el defensor no hubiera bloqueado el tiro.

football.english: The referee reviewed the play using VAR.
football.spanish: El árbitro revisó la jugada usando el VAR.

football.english: After missing the penalty, he apologized to his teammates.
football.spanish: Después de fallar el penal, se disculpó con sus compañeros.

football.english: Their strategy focused on quick counterattacks.
football.spanish: Su estrategia se centró en contraataques rápidos.

music.english: He plays the piano every day.
music.spanish: Él toca el piano todos los días.
A él le gusta la música clásica.

music.english: The band released a new album last month.
music.spanish: La banda lanzó un nuevo álbum el mes pasado.

music.english: She learned to play the guitar by herself.
music.spanish: Ella aprendió a tocar la guitarra sola.

music.english: They performed live in front of thousands of people.
music.spanish: Ellos tocaron en vivo frente a miles de personas.

music.english: The drummer kept the rhythm perfectly.
music.spanish: El baterista mantuvo el ritmo perfectamente.

music.english: He forgot the lyrics during the concert.
music.spanish: Olvidó la letra durante el concierto.

music.english: Even though the show was delayed, the audience stayed excited.
music.spanish: Aunque el espectáculo se retrasó, el público se mantuvo emocionado.

music.english: The singer would have lost her voice if she hadn’t rested.
music.spanish: La cantante habría perdido la voz si no hubiera descansado.

music.english: He composed a song inspired by his travels.
music.spanish: Compuso una canción inspirada en sus viajes.

music.english: The orchestra played with great precision and emotion.
music.spanish: La orquesta tocó con gran precisión y emoción.

music.english: She recorded her first album in a small studio.
music.spanish: Grabó su primer álbum en un pequeño estudio.

medicine.spanish: Los médicos ayudan a las personas enfermas.

medicine.english: He takes medicine twice a day.
medicine.spanish: Toma medicina dos veces al día.

medicine.english: The nurse works in the hospital.
medicine.spanish: La enfermera trabaja en el hospital.
Se siente mejor después de descansar.

medicine.english: The doctor examined the patient carefully.
medicine.spanish: El médico examinó al paciente cuidadosamente.

medicine.english: She prescribed antibiotics for the infection.
medicine.spanish: Ella recetó antibióticos para la infección.

medicine.english: He broke his leg while playing soccer.
medicine.spanish: Se rompió la pierna mientras jugaba al fútbol.

medicine.english: The operation was a complete success.
medicine.spanish: La operación fue un éxito total.

medicine.english: They are studying to become surgeons.
medicine.spanish: Ellos están estudiando para ser cirujanos.

medicine.english: If she had gone to the hospital earlier, she would have recovered faster.
medicine.spanish: Si hubiera ido al hospital antes, se habría recuperado más rápido.

medicine.english: Despite the pain, he continued his treatment.
medicine.spanish: A pesar del dolor, continuó su tratamiento.

medicine.english: The vaccine helped reduce the spread of the disease.
medicine.spanish: La vacuna ayudó a reducir la propagación de la enfermedad.

medicine.english: After years of research, they found a new cure.
medicine.spanish: Después de años de investigación, encontraron una nueva cura.

medicine.english: The patient needs to follow a strict diet after surgery.
medicine.spanish: El paciente debe seguir una dieta estricta después de la cirugía.

programming.english: He is learning to code in Python.
programming.spanish: Está aprendiendo a programar en Python.

programming.english: They write simple programs every day.
programming.spanish: Ellos escriben programas simples todos los días.

programming.english: She uses a laptop to practice coding.
programming.spanish: Ella usa una laptop para practicar programación.
Le gusta resolver problemas de lógica.
Ellos están estudiando ciencias de la computación.

programming.english: The program didn’t run because of a syntax error.
programming.spanish: El programa no se ejecutó por un error de sintaxis.

programming.english: She created a web page using HTML and CSS.
programming.spanish: Ella creó una página web usando HTML y CSS.

programming.english: He fixed the bug by changing one line of code.
programming.spanish: Arregló el error cambiando una línea de código.

programming.english: They are testing the new API with Postman.
programming.spanish: Están probando la nueva API con Postman.

programming.english: He added a new feature to the application.
programming.spanish: Agregó una nueva función a la aplicación.

programming.english: If the database is not connected, the server will crash.
programming.spanish: Si la base de datos no está conectada, el servidor fallará.

programming.english: After learning Python, she started using Django.
programming.spanish: Después de aprender Python, comenzó a usar Django.

programming.english: They developed an AI model to translate languages.
programming.spanish: Desarrollaron un modelo de IA para traducir idiomas.

programming.english: He spent hours debugging a complex algorithm.
programming.spanish: Pasó horas depurando un algoritmo complejo.

programming.english: The project succeeded thanks to teamwork and good communication.
programming.spanish: El proyecto tuvo éxito gracias al trabajo en equipo y la buena comunicación.

cars.english: She cleans her car every weekend.
cars.spanish: Ella limpia su coche todos los fines de semana.

cars.english: They traveled by car to the beach.
cars.spanish: Viajaron en coche a la playa.

cars.english: He learned how to drive a manual car.
cars.spanish: Aprendió a conducir un coche manual.

cars.english: They checked the brakes before the trip.
cars.spanish: Revisaron los frenos antes del viaje.

cars.english: The car needs a new battery.
cars.spanish: El coche necesita una batería nueva.

cars.english: If the car had more fuel, they could have continued driving.
cars.spanish: Si el coche tuviera más combustible, podrían haber seguido conduciendo.

cars.english: Despite the rain, they arrived on time.
cars.spanish: A pesar de la lluvia, llegaron a tiempo.

cars.english: He sold his old car to buy an electric one.
cars.spanish: Vendió su coche viejo para comprar uno eléctrico.

cars.english: After checking the GPS, they took a shorter route.
cars.spanish: Después de revisar el GPS, tomaron una ruta más corta.

cars.english: The traffic was heavy because of an accident.
cars.spanish: El tráfico estaba pesado debido a un accidente.
